name: Rust

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 50% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 60% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 70% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 80% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%.

description: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.
